snippet: Scientists researching the severe decline in Alaska's Steller sea lion population have a fingered a new possible suspect for the drop: Pacific sleeper sharks, a species previously thought of as a scavenger and fish-eater....

headline.print_headline: Study: Sleeper Sharks May Kill Steller Sea Lions
headline.main: Study: Sleeper Sharks May Kill Steller Sea Lions

lead_paragraph: Scientists researching the severe decline in Alaska's Steller sea lion population have a fingered a new possible suspect for the drop: Pacific sleeper sharks, a species previously thought of as a scavenger and fish-eater.
